item.title: Nvidia earnings aren’t slowing. Why that’s good news for its Big Tech rivals.
item.description: Nvidia’s growth means the AI and chip market is expanding, giving others a change to share in the wealth.

item.title: Dell sees its backlog swell as big AI deals come through

item.title: ‘She’s not working outside the home’: My mother, 63, inherited $100,000. Is she too old to invest in the stock market?
item.description: “Are the only options to create a CD ladder or leave it in a high-interest savings account?”
